title: Power cuts for Saturday (02)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The CEB’s request for 8 hours and 30 minutes power cut was approved by the PUCSL due to limited supply of fuel for thermal power plants, for tomorrow (02)
Who’s the real mastermind behind Thursday’s (31) violence ? – Manusha
Those who incited violence during Mirihana Protests are political extremists – Govt Min.
